title: Adrian Peterson Just Named THREE Teams He's Thinking About Going To Next Season | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Adrian Peterson Just Named THREE Teams He's Thinking About Going To Next Season posted by Aj Mansour - share 
Welp, it's crunch time for the Minnesota Vikings and running back Adrian Peterson and AP might have just made the first move. 
Joining ESPN on TV for their First Take program, Peterson listed off three teams that he's considering for next season if things don't work out here in Minnesota. The teams he mentioned include the New York Giants, Tampa Bay Buccaneers and Houston Texans. 
He continued to make his own bed saying... 
"I want the opportunity to compete for a championship," Peterson continued. "A team that has a good defense, a good offensive scheme as well and a great coaching staff cuz that really helps. 
Is he alluding to the fact that his current team, you know the one he's presently under contract with, doesn't have these things? 
It should be noted that Peterson did mention at the beginning of the interview that he hopes it works out here in Minnesota but the next 30 days will be "crucial"... Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
